column3: When you use the Recover action, shape tiles equal to essence gained.
Ignore the effects of difficult terrain.
Choose another damage type. Your manifestations deal hybrid damage and you gain resistance to that damage type.
Choose an additional terrain type. You can decide which one to create and can overlay them.
Choose a second ailment and a second affliction. Can always choose which one to apply.
Passively shape twice as many tiles with Overgrowth feature, radius reduced to 2 tiles.
Ignore the effects of your own terrain.
At the start of each of your turns, restore any shaped effects that were removed the Interact action.
You have advantage on all attacks that apply forced movement.
While you have absorption, you are immune to forced movement.
You have advantage on Recover and Essence Tap skill checks made while on a shaped tile.
Shape twice times as much hilly terrain, but edges are gradual.
3 essence: Copy each terrain into an adjacent tile if able. Uses all three uses of Wildshaping.
You have advantage on basic attacks while on your terrain.
You can choose not to activate your Overgrowth feature.
When you would use a targeted action, you may pay 1 essence and choose a tile that contains your terrain. If you do, you may use that action as if you were occupying that tile instead.
